00022 #include "dfsch/lib/regex.h"
00023 
00024 static dfsch_object_t* native_regex_compile(void *baton, 
00025                                             dfsch_object_t* args, 
00026                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00027   char* expression;
00028   int flags = REG_EXTENDED;
00029   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, expression);
00030 
00031   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00032   DFSCH_FLAG_UNSET("basic", REG_EXTENDED, flags);
00033   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("icase", REG_ICASE, flags);
00034   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("nosub", REG_NOSUB, flags);
00035   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("newline", REG_NEWLINE, flags);
00036   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00037 
00038   return dfsch_regex_compile(expression, flags);
00039 }
00040 
00041 static dfsch_object_t* native_regex_match_p(void *baton, 
00042                                             dfsch_object_t* args, 
00043                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00044   dfsch_object_t* expression;
00045   char* string;
00046   int flags = 0;
00047   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, expression);
00048   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, string);
00049 
00050   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00051   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("notbol", REG_NOTBOL, flags);
00052   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("noteol", REG_NOTEOL, flags);
00053   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00054 
00055   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_regex_match_p(expression, string, flags));
00056 }
00057 
00058 static dfsch_object_t* native_regex_substrings(void *baton, 
00059                                                dfsch_object_t* args, 
00060                                                dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00061   dfsch_object_t* expression;
00062   char* string;
00063   int flags = 0;
00064   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, expression);
00065   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, string);
00066 
00067   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00068   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("notbol", REG_NOTBOL, flags);
00069   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("noteol", REG_NOTEOL, flags);
00070   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00071 
00072   return dfsch_regex_substrings(expression, string, flags);
00073 }
00074 
00075 static dfsch_object_t* native_regex_match_once_p(void *baton, 
00076                                                  dfsch_object_t* args, 
00077                                                  dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00078   char* expression;
00079   char* string;
00080   int mflags = 0;
00081   int cflags = REG_EXTENDED | REG_NOSUB;
00082   
00083   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, expression);
00084   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, string);
00085 
00086   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00087   DFSCH_FLAG_UNSET("basic", REG_EXTENDED, cflags);
00088   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("icase", REG_ICASE, cflags);
00089   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("newline", REG_NEWLINE, cflags);
00090   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("notbol", REG_NOTBOL, mflags);
00091   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("noteol", REG_NOTEOL, mflags);
00092   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00093 
00094   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_regex_match_once_p(expression, 
00095                                              cflags, 
00096                                              mflags, 
00097                                              string));
00098 }
00099 
00100 static dfsch_object_t* native_regex_substrings_once(void *baton, 
00101                                                     dfsch_object_t* args, 
00102                                                     dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00103   char* expression;
00104   char* string;
00105   int mflags = 0;
00106   int cflags = REG_EXTENDED;
00107   
00108   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, expression);
00109   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, string);
00110 
00111   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00112   DFSCH_FLAG_UNSET("basic", REG_EXTENDED, cflags);
00113   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("icase", REG_ICASE, cflags);
00114   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("newline", REG_NEWLINE, cflags);
00115   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("notbol", REG_NOTBOL, mflags);
00116   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("noteol", REG_NOTEOL, mflags);
00117   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00118 
00119   return dfsch_regex_substrings_once(expression, cflags, mflags, string);
00120 }

00123 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_regex_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00124   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "regex:compile", 
00125                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_regex_compile,NULL));
00126   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "regex:match?", 
00127                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_regex_match_p,NULL));
00128   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "regex:substrings", 
00129                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_regex_substrings,NULL));
00130   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "regex:match-once?", 
00131                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_regex_match_once_p,NULL));
00132   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "regex:substrings-once", 
00133                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_regex_substrings_once, NULL));
00134 
00135   dfsch_provide(ctx, "regex");
00136 
00137   return NULL;
00138 }
